TypeTeamMember.biography: Andrew is the Chief Product Officer at TripleLift. He oversees product for the company’s native advertising platform, branded content solution, and OTT brand integrations. Previously, he served as VP of product management for AppNexus, a Xandr Company. An early AppNexus employee, he was instrumental in leading the buy-side product team, helping the company grow from 100 to more than 1,000 employees, launching video there in 2015, and facilitating AT&T’s recent multi-billion dollar acquisition of AppNexus.
